resources.string:
Geological Timescale

This App shows the geological timescale of the earth's history. The most recent geologic periods are at the top, the most ancient periods are at the bottom. The larger units are at the left, the smaller units are at the right.

ورژن: {VERSION}
https://github.com/tengel/GeologicalTimescale

Usage:

ودھواوݨ:
Add a column with smaller units at the right.
سِمٹاوݨ:
Remove the column with smallest units.
کھبے سویپ کرن
Move the display towards the smaller units.
سچے سویپ کرن
Move the display towards the larger units.

حوالے

بھو وگیان دا ڈیٹا: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Geologic_time_scale پنجابی وچ تکنیکی لفظ: انگریزی پنجاںی تکنیکی شبداولی (بھو وگیان)
